Datos.Consulta: SELECT E.id as id,U.Descripcion as ubicacion,A.Descripcion as articulo,A.Marca as marca,A.Modelo as modelo,E.numserie as numserie,E.cantidad, DATE_FORMAT(E.fechacompra, '%d/%m/%Y') as fechaCompra FROM Elementos E inner join Articulos A on E.id_articulo=A.id inner join Ubicaciones U on E.id_ubicacion=U.id order by ubicacion,articulo,marca,modelo,numserie;
